description: T1 False Acacia growing between the x-ray unit and portacabin in the lawn area - Remove the branches overhanging the buildings, portacabin and x-ray unit by 1m from 7m to 6m. Remove deadwood.T2 Gingko growing between the x-ray unit and portacabin in the lawn area - Remove sucker growth up to 2m from ground level. Remove the crossing and rubbing branches. Cut back the branches overhanging the x-ray unit by 0.5m from 4m to 3.5m.T3 False Acacia growing between the x-ray unit and portacabin in the lawn area furthest away - Remove the two lowest branches overhanging the portacabin and x-ray unit back to trunk, currently 7m over the x-ray unit and 6m towards the portacabin. Remove deadwood. Lift the remaining branches overhanging the x-ray unit by 1m from 4m to 3m. Lift the remaining branches over the portacabin by 1m from 6m to 5m.T4 Tree covered in ivy and creepers growing near an old shed - Cut back to clear the shed of the ivy.SUBJECT TO TPO 737A (6.12.1991)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
